ComicInfo.Summary: The Harrowing [Part 4]: Lady Death uses her sword, Nightmare, and her new weapon, the Eternal Scythe, to stave off the Galilean and the hordes of Hell being led by the angel assassin. Victory is achieved and Lady Death once again finds herself the ruler of Hell but discovers, unfortunately, that her realm is quickly disintegrating from the outside in.
ComicInfo.Title: The Harrowing [Part 4]
